name: GameJam 2017 Slender
description:
Hello,

This is a slender, for the ue4 Game Jam. It is'nt as much good as i wanted, but it's okay, for a first game jam in solo !

Controls :

zqsd - move

Right Mouse - TorchLight On/Off

Left Mouse - Shoot at slenders

E - Take Energy

Shift - Run

Ctrl - Stealth

P - Pause

It should works on Xbox Controllers too
